channel.title: Meme on RizPur
channel.description: Recent content in Meme on RizPur

item.title: WhatsApp Meme Bot
item.description: Memes I love memes and rice. It is known. Ever been in a chat and thought, “need meme now”? Well, your wish is this bot’s command. This bot spices up conversations with memes from my handpicked Instagram collection. The Guts of the Operation Python: The muscle that digs through my memes. Selenium: Helps Python interact with WhatsApp Web. WhatsApp Web: Where your chats get a dose of meme magic. How it works Text me “memepls” on WhatsApp, and this Python-powered bot will dive into my ultimate meme collection on my local computer.
